name: Ebola Healthcare Preparedness and Response for Select Cities with Enhanced Airport Entrance Screenings from Affected Countries in West Africa
objective: To enable select public health departments serving regions where enhanced airport screenings are occurring to procure personal protective equipment and supplies, train staff, retrofit facilities, and carry out other necessary Ebola-specific preparedness, response, and recovery activities.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: ADMINISTRATION FOR STRATEGIC PREPAREDNESS AND RESPONSE

authorizations.text: III, 311, Public Health Service Act, Section 311 (42 U.S.C. 243).
